document_data.caption: A map showing Talagath near the center of Talagath's Gauntlet between the Lake of Steam and Shining Sea.
document_data.name: Talagath
document_data.mainbody: '''Talagath''' was a small island found between the the [[Lake of Steam]] and the [[Shining Sea]].{{Cite interactive atlas}}<ref name=EotSS.M">
document_data.Geography: The island was located near the center of the strait known as [[Talagath's Gauntlet]]. Talagath measured roughly {{SI|30|mi|k|long=yes}} long and {{SI|10|mi|k|long=yes}} wide. There were no man-made structures on the island,
document_data.Description: Talagath was a lush and heavily forested island.<ref name=EotSS-p141"/>
document_data.Inhabitants: Historically, the island was used by smugglers and pirates as a meeting place for making deals and exchanging goods. A number of [[snake]]s and other beasts lived on the island.<ref name=EotSS-p141"/>
document_data.Rumors & Legends: Talagath was widely believed to be haunted. Anyone staying on the island could not shake the sinister feeling that they were being observed and items from their gear wound up missing when they woke. Unbeknownst to all, the last [[Magelord (prestige class)|Magelord]] of [[Mintar]], a [[lich]] named [[Sardukh]], maintained a hidden lair on Talagath and did not suffer those who overstayed their welcome.<ref name=EotSS-p141"/>
